news.title: Man, 76, charged after children fell ill at Leicestershire summer camp
news.summary: Jon Ruben, 76, is charged with child cruelty offences, the Crown Prosecution Service says.

news.title: Trump moves nuclear submarines after ex-Russian president's comments
news.summary: US President Donald Trump says two nuclear submarines are being deployed in the "appropriate regions".

news.title: Confusion and anger in Switzerland - hit by highest tariffs in Europe
news.summary: Trump threatened Switzerland with 31% tariffs but they ended up even higher, leaving the country asking why.

news.title: Two girls shot in Gaza - BBC pieces together what happened and looks at dozens more child shootings
news.summary: Layan and Mira were killed in proximity to IDF soldiers - the Israeli military says intentional harm to civilians is prohibited and their cases will be examined by the authorities.

news.title: Top MoD civil servant to leave in wake of Afghan data breach
news.summary: Permanent Secretary David Williams will leave this autumn, the Ministry of Defence has confirmed.

news.title: Storm Floris to bring 'unseasonably disruptive' rain and wind to UK
news.summary: UK Met Office has named Storm Floris which will bring strong winds and heavy rain on Monday.

news.title: Siblings, 11 and 13, who drowned in Spain named
news.summary: Ameiya and Ricardo Junior Parris were pulled from the water on Tuesday, officials say.

news.title: Trump envoy visits controversial Gaza aid distribution site
news.summary: The visit with the IDF follows near daily reports of deadly shootings in the vicinity of the sites.

news.title: Sheffield Wednesday failing to pay players and staff as club's financial crisis deepens
news.summary: As Sheffield Wednesday's crisis deepens, concern for the club's future is growing.

news.title: BBC told bad behaviour 'should not be rewarded' as calls to pull MasterChef series mount
news.summary: It comes as a MasterChef contestant says she was edited out after asking for the new series not to be broadcast.
